name: Growing Pains (Season 1)
summary: 该剧主要讲述住在纽约长岛的西维尔一家(The Seaver's)的日常生活故事。心理医生杰森·西维尔（艾伦·锡克）为了支持他的妻子，玛姬·马龙·西维尔（乔安娜·克恩斯）重新回到记者岗位，决定将心理诊所开在家里。因此杰森不得不照看三个孩子：捣蛋鬼迈克（柯克·卡梅隆）、优等生开萝尔（特蕾茜·格尔德）和机灵鬼本（杰瑞米·米勒）。从1988年开始，克瑞斯·西维尔加入了这个欢乐的家庭。婴儿时期的小克瑞斯由双胞胎克莉丝汀和凯西·杜灵轮流演出。到了1990年的秋季，由阿什丽·约翰逊开始扮演年龄设定为6岁的克瑞斯。后来，卢克·鲍尔(莱昂纳多·迪卡普里奥)作为养子也成为家庭成员。
info:
• 中文名: 成长的烦恼 第一季
  • 配角: Earl Boen、Leonardo DiCaprio
  • 集数: 22
  • 开始: 1985-09-24
  • 结束: 1986-05-13
  • 类型: 情景喜剧Sitcom
  • 国家/地区: 美国
  • 每集长: 24min
  • 频道: ABC
  • imdb_id: tt0088527
  • 导演: John Tracy、John Pasquin
  • 编剧: Neal Marlens
  • 主演: Alan Thicke、Joanna Kerns、Kirk Cameron、Tracey Gold、Jeremy Miller、Ashley Johnson、Leonardo DiCaprio
  • 音乐: John Bettis、Steve Dorff
  • 出品人: Neal Marlens (1985–86)、Mike Sullivan、Steve Marshall、Dan Guntzelman (1985–91)、Dan Wilcox (1991–92)
  • 制片人/制作人: David Lerner (season 1)、Arnold Margolin、Bruce Ferber
  • 制作公司: Guntzelman/Sullivan/Marshall Productions (seasons 5–6) Warner Bros. Television

tags.name: 娘的为什么我没有妹妹

eps.name: Pilot
eps.desc: Maggie goes back to work as journalist, leaving Jason to take care of the kids. Underage Mike gets arrested for driving a car.

eps.name: Springsteen
eps.desc: Mike tries desperately to get tickets to a Bruce Springsteen concert and is ecstatic when Jason gets them.

eps.name: Jealousy
eps.desc: Jason becomes suspicious that Maggie is doing more with a co-worker (Tom O'Rourke) than working on a story.

eps.name: Carol's Article
eps.desc: Carol auditions for her school paper, but is angered when her mother doesn't give her a good review. Meanwhile, Mike and Ben get on a winning streak betting on horses.

eps.name: Superdad!
eps.desc: With Maggie's increased workload, Jason takes on more responsibilities at home and gives Carol boy-trouble advice. Maggie is uptight with Jason for being more involved with the kids...after she urged Jason to do just that.

eps.name: Mike's Madonna Story
eps.desc: Mike becomes romantically attracted to a "Madonna look-alike" (Dana Plato), which worries Maggie; Ben accidentally ruins Carol's plant project.

eps.name: Weekend Fantasy
eps.desc: Jason and Maggie leave Mike in charge while they go on a getaway weekend. But when nobody answers when they call home, they imagine all sorts of dreadful possibilities.

eps.name: Slice of Life
eps.desc: After Jason reviews a marriage-compatibility test for his work, he and Maggie take it. They're in for some unpleasant surprises.

eps.name: Carol's Crush
eps.desc: Carol has blooming romantic feelings for an older family friend, including jealousy when he's romantically attracted to someone else.

relations.title: Growing Pains: Return of the Seavers
